question:
Which of the following traits have been introduced by the right to information in the politico- administrative system?
(a) Caution
(b) Care
(c) Vigilance
(d) Red-tapism

Select the most suitable answer from the options given below:
explanation: Right to Information (RTI) Act 2005 provides right to information for citizens to secure access to information under the control of public authorities, to promote transparency and accountability in the working of every public authority. Right to information introduced caution, care, and vigilance in the politico-administrative system.
